title: Danny & Katie Couric!
itunes:title: Danny & Katie Couric!
itunes:subtitle: It's Everything Iconic's 250th episode!! We're celebrating with queen/icon/legend Katie Couric! She is on the show talking about comfort in the time of Covid-19, ageism in media, her thoughts on Apple TV's Morning Show, and SO much ...
description:
It's Everything Iconic's 250th episode!! We're celebrating with queen/icon/legend Katie Couric! She is on the show talking about comfort in the time of Covid-19, ageism in media, her thoughts on Apple TV's Morning Show, and SO much more! Listen to her podcast Next Question with Katie Couric and subscribe to her newsletter at KatieCouric.com.


Katie Interview: 4:30ish


Subscribe to the Everything Iconic newsletter: EverythingIconic.com

*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/dannypellegrino1

Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino

Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino

Facebook.com/PellegrinoDanny

Cameo.com/DannyPellegrino

T-shirts: EverythingIconic.store/

*Sponsored by SamsonTech.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
